languages.text: Лорд-капитан провел{mf||а} слишком много времени в моровой яме нижних туннелей, и теперь {mf|его|ее} кожу покрывают воспаленные волдыри. Кто-то на флагмане должен знать, как очистить тело Вольного Торговца от сего недуга.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.
languages.original_text: Лорд-капитан провел{mf||а} слишком много времени в моровой яме нижних туннелей, и теперь {mf|его|ее} кожу покрывают воспаленные волдыри. Кто-то на флагмане должен знать, как очистить тело Вольного Торговца от сего недуга.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit of the lower tunnels, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on the flagship who'll know how to purge this affliction from the Rogue Trader's body.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit of the lower tunnels, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on the flagship who'll know how to purge this affliction from the Rogue Trader's body.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on the flagship who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on the flagship who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

languages.text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha pasado demasiado tiempo en el foso de pestilencia junto a la línea de carga de la nave, y ahora su piel está cubierta de ampollas inflamadas. Tiene que haber alguien a bordo que sepa curar al Comerciante Independiente de esta infección.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

traits.locale_text: {mf|El|La} Lord Capitán ha pasado demasiado tiempo en el foso de pestilencia junto a la línea de carga de la nave, y ahora su piel está cubierta de ampollas inflamadas. Tiene que haber alguien a bordo que sepa curar al Comerciante Independiente de esta infección.

languages.text: ロード・キャプテンはヴォイドシップの貨物線脇にある疫病の穴で長い時間を過ごしすぎたため、{mf|彼|彼女}の皮膚は炎症を起こした水ぶくれで覆われている。自由開拓者の体からこの病気を取り除く方法を知っている者が船内にいるはずだ。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

traits.locale_text: ロード・キャプテンはヴォイドシップの貨物線脇にある疫病の穴で長い時間を過ごしすぎたため、{mf|彼|彼女}の皮膚は炎症を起こした水ぶくれで覆われている。自由開拓者の体からこの病気を取り除く方法を知っている者が船内にいるはずだ。

languages.text: 行商浪人在货运区域旁边的疫病坑里逗留了太久，皮肤上长满了红肿的水泡。这艘船上肯定有人知道如何消除行商浪人此刻遭受的痛苦。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人在货运区域旁边的疫病坑里逗留了太久，皮肤上长满了红肿的水泡。这艘船上肯定有人知道如何消除行商浪人此刻遭受的痛苦。

languages.text: Der Lord Captain hat zu viel Zeit in der Pestilenzgrube bei der Frachtroute des Raumschiffs verbracht, und nun ist {mf|seine|ihre} Haut mit entzündeten Blasen bedeckt. Irgendjemand an Bord muss wissen, wie man den Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von dieser Krankheit befreit.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

traits.locale_text: Der Lord Captain hat zu viel Zeit in der Pestilenzgrube bei der Frachtroute des Raumschiffs verbracht, und nun ist {mf|seine|ihre} Haut mit entzündeten Blasen bedeckt. Irgendjemand an Bord muss wissen, wie man den Körper {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} von dieser Krankheit befreit.

languages.text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} s'est trop longuement {mf|exposé|exposée} aux miasmes de la fosse aux pestilences proche de la ligne de fret et souffre à présent d'une éruption cutanée. Quelqu'un à bord doit pouvoir l'aider à se soigner.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.

traits.locale_text: {mf|Le seigneur-capitaine|La seigneure-capitaine} s'est trop longuement {mf|exposé|exposée} aux miasmes de la fosse aux pestilences proche de la ligne de fret et souffre à présent d'une éruption cutanée. Quelqu'un à bord doit pouvoir l'aider à se soigner.

languages.text: Lord Kaptan, uçsuz gemisinin yük hattındaki hastalık çukurunda çok fazla zaman geçirdi ve bu yüzden teni yakıcı kabarcıklarla kaplandı. Gemide Hür Tacir'in bedenini bu hastalıktan nasıl arındıracağını bilen birileri olmalı.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain spent too much time in the pestilence pit by the voidship's freight line, and now {mf|his|her} skin is covered in inflamed blisters. There must be someone on board who knows how to purge the Rogue Trader's body of this affliction.
